label: 藤原有国
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (943-1011). Tutor to the Crown Prince. Kanshi in Honchō reisō (9), Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集 (1), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (1), and Wakan kensakushu (1). [漢詩、本朝麗藻、和漢兼作集]
